summary: A game app project being built and deployed. User wants the app title set to 'YONO DAN'.

existing_features.title: Set the app title to 'YONO DAN' in the HTML entry point (frontend/index.html <title> tag) so it appears in browser tabs and when shared.
Update the app name/branding displayed in the app header and any splash/login screens from the current title to 'YONO DAN'.
